document.full_text: oman's sultan qaboos bin said has pardoned 234 protesters arrested during weeks of demonstrations in the gulf arab state, the official news agency said on wednesday.
document.title: oman pardons 234 arrested during protests
lines_and_colors: oman's sultan qaboos bin said has pardoned 234 protesters arrested during weeks of demonstrations in the gulf arab state, the official news agency said on wednesday.
